entry.title: Permutations and Combinations in Detail
entry.summary:
Topic

Yesterday we continued talking about permutations. We also saw formulas for finding the number of permutations with and without repetition. Today we are going to finish by talking about combinations.

If you still find permutations and combinations somewhate confusing, or if you just want to review, check out the following resources:

Resources

Websites

  • "Better Explained" - Permutations and Combinations
  • Math is Fun - Permutations and Combinations

Videos

  • Khan Academy - Permutations and Combinations
